text: Staryl Chester Austin, Jr. (September 16, 1920 – January 1, 2015) was an American brigadier general in the United States Air Force. He was a former Assistant Adjutant General of Oregon and 142nd Fighter Group’s Air Officer, Chief of the Administrative Division. He was a member of the Oregon Aviation Hall of Honor. Austin died on January 1, 2015 at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American generals Category:Military people from Oregon
title: Staryl C. Austin
